title: FPS stutter on good graphics card
body:
I recently upgraded from a potato of a computer to a new PC. It has a gtx960 4g for graphics and I get about 350fps mostly, except every minute or so I get an "fps stutter" were my fps will drop down to 15 in an instant and then only a second later shoots back to 350 instantly. The screen basically freezes for a second, causing me to die often when going in to fights. It happens when I turn down the graphics to a lower setting as well.

Just wondering if anyone has had similar issues and has found a fix. thanks

replies.body: This is exactly what I am getting, I bought a new laptop with a 980m in it, should be running well over 200 fps, and it does, but it'sa micro glitch/stutter and it happens every so often in game, especially with a shoot a spell or place a ward or whatever. It's so FRUSTRATING.

Hello Lobster,

This seems to be like an issue I've had before. Add me in game and I might be able to help you.

~ORION~
